original_title: Chikara: The Sordid Perils of Everyday Existence
overview: In a lucha de apuesta, Chris Hero wagers his hair against the mask of Equinox and the result casts a long shadow over CHIKARA's future. Incoherence fights to remain Los Campeones de Parejas! Shane Storm breaks his losing streak with a little help from UltraMantis Black!
title: Chikara: The Sordid Perils of Everyday Existence
